item.description:
i've gotten a lot of emails in the past few weeks from new people interested in coming out. you are more than welcome...all you have to do is rsvp and show up! :) we play with whomever is there by 8:30. it is a long game so plan on sticking around until 11:15/11:30.

I'll be there at 7 to hold the table and play board games/cards. Please be there by 8:30 if you want to play. That's when they ask for $ and team names. They won't accept more than 5 per team so if you show up after the game has started we might be full. They're pretty strict on the rules at Anna Liffey's.
*******NEW RULE: If you're not there by 8:30, you won't be able to play with the NHC teams. I've decided not to hold places for people. Seating is too hard to come by*****

Start thinking up those dirty team names!!!

Natalie is the contact for this event 512-413-4119 (fyi, trivia is in the basement so reception is pretty lousy. Also you're not allowed to have your phone out during the quiz so after 9 we'll be unreachable.)
item.name: Trivia Time!
